Class FileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiralabra.compression_project.FileHandler

  • public class FileHandler
extends Object
    A class for handling reading and writing of the files.

      • readFile

        public MyArrayList<String> readFile(String filename)
        Read the lines in the given file.
        Parameters:

      • writeHffByteFile

        public int writeHffByteFile(String filename,
                            String fileString)
                     throws FileNotFoundException,
                            IOException
        Write the compressed version of a file as bytes.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file.
        fileString - The compressed file that includes bytes.
        Returns:
        The division needed later for byte counting.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Exception when file not found.
        IOException - IOException.

      • readByteFile

        public byte[] readByteFile(String filename,
                           String fileEnding)
                    throws IOException
        Read the compressed file with bytes in it.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file.
        fileEnding - The ending of the file name, e.g. "compress_hff.txt"
        Returns:
        The array of bytes written from the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - IOException.

      • writeFile

        public void writeFile(String filename,
                      String linesToWrite,
                      String fileEnding)
               throws IOException
        Write the given lines to a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file.
        linesToWrite - The lines to be written.
        fileEnding - The ending part of the file, e.g. "compressed_lz.txt"
        Throws:
        IOException - IOException.
